arts.ttl: 'Some talent': Pundit blown away by Chelsea player who reminded him of Chris Waddle against Brentford
arts.sum: Chelsea are going along nicely under Enzo Maresca and the onlooking pundits are salivating over a couple of their players at the moment. Maresca is...

arts.ttl: Every word Enzo Maresca said on Chelsea title race, Marc Cucurella red card, Brentford win
arts.sum: "No matter how many games we are going to win, I think we are not ready to compete for the title. I've told you many times I would love the pressure to compete for titles but we are not ready for many reasons; one of the reasons why is because we cannot concede the goal we conceded, open the game and give them the chance to take a point here."

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca reveals why he feels Chelsea can't compete for the title despite moving just two points behind Liverpool with win over Brentford
arts.sum: The Blues secured a 2-1 win at home to Brentford on Sunday to close the gap on league leaders Liverpool to just two points, although Arne Slot's side have a game in hand.

arts.ttl: Revealed: Why Marc Cucurella was sent off AFTER the full-time whistle in Chelsea's win over Brentford
arts.sum: The heated scenes continued after the final whistle and referee Peter Bankes booked Brentford forward Kevin Shade and showed Cucurella a second yellow.

arts.ttl: Brentford very close to 'deserved' draw - Frank
arts.sum: Boss Thomas Frank praises Brentford's performance and says a draw with Chelsea would have been "well deserved" as they lose 2-1 at Stamford Bridge.

arts.ttl: Chelsea 2-1 Brentford: Player ratings as Cucurella & Jackson decide west London derby
arts.sum: Player ratings from Chelsea's 2-1 win over Brentford in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Chelsea beat Brentford and move to within two points of Premier League summit
arts.sum: Marc Cucurella and Nicolas Jackson were on target for Enzo Maresca’s team.

arts.ttl: LIVE: Two more Sunday games as Chelsea face Brentford, Spurs at Southampton
